name: Going Home (Max)
description:
This is a game I started developing on 10/16/2017 for the Bloody Jam gamejam.

You play as a child coming home from school through a dangerous, dark forest. You encounter various obstacles, like branches, tree stumps, rocks, boulders, streams, rivers, cars, etc. that you have to climb over, crawl under, or jump over. On top of that, you're being chased by wolves, and worse! On this Halloween there are worse fates than being eaten alive, it seems.

You survive these various obstacles by typing. Words appear above the obstacles that you must type in order to surpass. Small obstacles have easy words. Large obstacles have hard words. There will be a few other special words as well, like "flashlight" to turn on your flashlight/torch, or "battery" when said flashlight suddenly starts flickering, because why wouldn't it.

I've started many, but never completed a game before. I hope this is the first. I'm using Godot Engine 2.1.4.
